<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_include">
    <sys_script_include action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE">
        <access>package_private</access>
        <active>true</active>
        <api_name>global.SNCSAMLResponseValidator</api_name>
        <caller_access/>
        <client_callable>false</client_callable>
        <description/>
        <name>SNCSAMLResponseValidator</name>
        <script><![CDATA[var SNCSAMLResponseValidator = Class.create();
SNCSAMLResponseValidator.prototype = {
    initialize: function() {
    },
	
	// Method to validate the saml response for any security issues before it is processed.
	validateSAMLResponsePreProcessing: function(request, samlResponseDoc, samlResponseObject) {
		return true;
	},
	
	// Method to validate the saml response for any security issues after it is processed.
	validateSAMLResponsePostProcessing: function(request) {
		return true;
	},

    type: 'SNCSAMLResponseValidator'
};]]></script>
        <sys_class_name>sys_script_include</sys_class_name>
        <sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by>
        <sys_created_on>2018-04-13 23:39:00</sys_created_on>
